screen_desc: The screenshot shows the Google Search app on a smartphone with the search bar at the top. action_desc: Tap on the search (magnifying glass) icon to execute the search.
action_result:
By clicking on the search bar with the search content "… nike app," the Google search has been executed using the query "new nike air max shoes on nike app." This resulted in the display of search results, including advertisements and links related to the query for new Nike Air Max shoes.

This action has made progress towards completing the user request to search for the new Nike Air Max shoes on Nike. The current screen now shows search results from which the user can choose to learn more about the new Nike Air Max shoes, including the option to visit Nike's official website or see the latest releases. If the intent was to find the shoes specifically through the Nike app, the user can follow links that may direct them to the app or its download page.
